OOC: Wow all that happened while I was sleeping.

::Aerotaur::
      He sees all of the action moving around him.  He takes to the air heading straight for the CF since no one was paying him any heed.  On his way he sends a transmision to the CF.  "This is Aerotaur.  I am coming to aid in the defence of Windlord.  I would apreciate it if you didn't try to shoot me down.  Thank you."
